Modification_Detail.description: Per "Guide toPDS4 Context Products" v1.3, - changed all lidvid_reference to lid_reference - changed target LIDs to new formation rule
extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Investigation.name: DEEP IMPACT
Investigation.description: The goal of the Deep Impact mission was to understand the physical and chemical properties of a comet as a function of depth below the surface. The mission delivered an impactor spacecraft onto the nucleus of 9P/Tempel 1. It was launched on January, 12, 2005.
